title: Sausage Rolls with Chicken
ingredients: ['500g chicken breasts, pulsed in a food processor until finely chopped', '20g celery leaves, roughly chopped', '20g baby spinach, roughly chopped', '1 small red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', '55g breadcrumbs', '2 eggs, beaten (1 for mixture, 1 to bind pastry)', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '1 small onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 sheets puff pastry, thawed if frozen']
